entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
